name: Name the Metal Band Quiz | Music Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Serj Tankian, Daron Malakian, Shavo Odadjian?
questions.explanation:
System of a Down.

	Only drummer John Dolmayan was born in the United States.

questions.text: Tom Araya, Dave Lombardo, Kerry King?
questions.explanation:
Slayer.

	Dave Lombardo was fired from the band and replaced by Paul Bostaph.

questions.text: CC DeVille, Brett Michaels, Bobby Dall?
questions.explanation:
Poison.

	Vocalist Brett Michaels once dated Pamela Anderson.

questions.text: Janick Gers, Blaze Bayley, Paul DiAnno?
questions.explanation:
Iron Maiden.

	Of the three mentioned, only Janick Gers remains in the band as of May 2002.

questions.text: Dave Sabo, Rob Affuso, Rachel Bolan?
questions.explanation:
Skid Row.

	Guitarist Dave 'Snake' Sabo was once a member of Bon Jovi.

questions.text: Logan Mader, Adam Duce, Chris Kontos?
questions.explanation:
Machine Head.

	Chris Kontos was fired from the band prior to their appearance at the 1995 Donington Monsters of Rock festival.

questions.text: Bobby Hambel, Billy Graziadei, Leo Curley?
questions.explanation:
Biohazard.

	Biohazard hit the heights when they released the album 'State of the World Address'.

questions.text: Johnny Rod, Chris Holmes, Bob Kulick?
questions.explanation:
W.A.S.P.

	When W.A.S.P. started out Blackie Lawless played bass guitar then switched to rhythm guitar once Johnny Rod joined the band.

questions.text: Andreas Kisser, Igor Cavalera, Paulo Jr.?
questions.explanation:
Sepultura.

	Max Cavalera quit the band when they fired his wife and Sepultura's manager behind his back.

questions.text: Terry Butler, Ronnie James Dio, Bill Ward?
questions.explanation:
Black Sabbath.

	Original vocalist Ozzy Osbourne has earned millions throughout his career and his new show 'The Osbournes' is a worldwide success.
